title: Burger Bar
description: A restaurant app that allows users to add names of burgers to the menu and devour them.
tools: Built with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars, and ORM.

title: Employee-Directory
description: A directory that allows you to sort employees by name or location.
tools: Built with React, API, and Bootstrap.

title: Recipe Hub
description: A recipe tool that allows users to save and search for recipes.
tools: Collaborative project built with Express, MySQL, Sequelize, web API, and Handlebars.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard that allows users to view a five day forecast for each selected city.
tools: Built with Javascript, HTML, CSS, and Open Weather API.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A fitness app allows users to create and track daily workouts.
tools: Built with MongoDB, Mongoose, Express, and Javascript.

title: README Generator
description: A CLI application that prompts users with a series of questions to generate a README.md file for your project.
tools: Built with Node.js and Inquirer npm. *Please note: there is no deployed link for this project.
